name: My Love 2
storyline:
Welcome to post-apocalyptic New York. You can't recall how you ended up here. You’ve got to pick a side. Their society has long ago split into two castes who sincerely hate each other and are in a constant struggle for resources and life. Can you melt their hearts amidst the chaos?
A fascinating mystical novel where you find yourself drawn into the conflict between rival factions. Form a team and become part of a love triangle.
summary: You choose the plot here. No crystals and tickets! Choices are equally important as they don’t cost crystals.
